plurals.name: guide_title
plurals.item: "This feature allows you to control your device using your voice. We'll walk you through the basic operations when you use voice controls for the first time. The tutorial will open automatically in %1$d seconds."

"This feature allows you to control your device using your voice. We'll walk you through the basic operations when you use voice controls for the first time. The tutorial will open automatically in %1$d second."
